overview:
Vinay Narula, has over 5 years of versatile development experience in Open Source technologies and his major area of expertise is development on LAMP based environments.

He is educated in the fundamentals and need of frameworks to follow for development, and his technical skill sets include WordPress, Joomla, Oscommerce with got hands on development experience in CakePHP as a development framework. Experience in APIs and technologies like Google APIs, PayPal APIs, Cloud Computing, Authorize.net, Braintree, Facebook Apps, cURL, WSDL/XML, RSS, SOAP, Jquery, and XHTML are also within his toolbag of skills.

Vinay key focus is expertise in E-commerce and social media domains.
